blueBitKit.ColorSensor:
blue:bit- Color module.
return red/green/blue ColorValue,Rang 0~255.
pin:I2C.
blueBitKit.MP3Play:
blue:bit-  mp3 player module.
mp3 player .set baud rate 9600
pin:Serial(rate:9600)
blueBitKit.MP3Volume:
blue:bit-  mp3 player module.
mp3 player Volume set 
pin:Serial(rate:9600)
blueBitKit.SegDigitsClear:
blue:bit- 4x7 SEG Display module.
display 4 Digits Clear
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.SegDigitsInit:
blue:bit- 4x7 SEG Display module.
display 4 Digits initialize.use SegDigits display before must be init.
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.SegDigits_:
blue:bit- 4x7 SEG Display module.
display 4 Digits
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.SerialRedirect|param|rx: the new reception pin, eg: DigitalPin.P0
blueBitKit.SerialRedirect|param|tx: the new transmission pin, eg: DigitalPin.P1
blueBitKit.Ultrasonic:
blue:bit- ultrasonic module.
return distance(unit cm ).
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.extIO_pinMode:
blue:bit- IO extend module.
control by i2c can extend eight IO
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.getAmbientLight:
blue:bit- Ambient Light module.
return LightValue(unit lux ).
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.getHumiTemp:
blue:bit- HUMI&Temp module.
return temperature(unit C ) and humidity (unit %).
pin:I2C.
blueBitKit.getLM35Temp:
blue:bit- LM35 Temp module.
return temperature,unit ?.
read analog pin only pin0/1/2/3/4/10.
blueBitKit.getNTC:
blue:bit- NTC Temp module.
return temperature,unit C.
blueBitKit.joyButtonVal:
blue:bit-joy Button module.
have A/B/C/D button,return 'true' if pressed; return'false' if not.
read analog pin only pin0/1/2/3/4/10.
blueBitKit.lcd1602Clear:
blue:bit-  lcd1602 module.
lcd1602 Clear
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.lcd1602Init:
blue:bit-  lcd1602 module.
lcd1602 initialize
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.lcd1602Print:
blue:bit-  lcd1602 module.
lcd1602 print string
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.lcd1602Scroll:
blue:bit-  lcd1602 module.
lcd1602 Scroll
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.lcd1602SetCursor:
blue:bit-  lcd1602 module.
lcd1602 SetCursor col:0~15.row:0~1
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.ledMatrixClear:
blue:bit- 8x8 LED matrix  module.
8x8 LED matrix Clear
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.ledMatrixInit:
blue:bit- 8x8 LED matrix  module.
8x8 LED matrix initialize
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.ledMatrx:
blue:bit- 8x8 LED matrix  module.
8x8 LED matrix display
use arrays.number[255,255,255,255,255,255,255,255]
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.midiInit:
blue:bit-  MIDI module.
MIDI init
pin:Serial(rate:31250)
blueBitKit.midiInit|param|rx: the new reception pin, eg: DigitalPin.P0
blueBitKit.midiInit|param|tx: the new transmission pin, eg: DigitalPin.P1
blueBitKit.midiNote:
blue:bit-  MIDI module.
MIDI Note
pin:Serial(rate:31250)
blueBitKit.midiSetInstrument:
blue:bit-  MIDI module.
MIDI Set instrument
pin:Serial(rate:31250)
blueBitKit.midiSetVolume:
blue:bit-  MIDI module.
MIDI SetVolume
pin:Serial(rate:31250)
blueBitKit.readExtIO:
blue:bit- IO extend module.
control by i2c can extend eight IO
pin:I2C
blueBitKit.writeExtIO:
blue:bit- IO extend module.
control by i2c can extend eight IO
